an5.245:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of bad conduct.
an5.245:4.4: After examination, sensible people criticize you.
an5.245:4.6: You drift away from true teachings.
an5.245:4.8: These are the five drawbacks of bad conduct.
an5.245:5.1: There are these five benefits of good conduct.
an5.245:5.4: After examination, sensible people praise you.
an5.245:5.6: You drift away from untrue teachings.
an5.245:5.8: These are the five benefits of good conduct.”
